participant_1.background:
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
i m the youngest of five.
my wife and i enjoy long sunday drives.
I live in my parent's basement and work a lot, so I usually don't have time for a healthy diet or exercise.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office.
My grandkids love to go to the park with me and we always have a great time running around and playing on the swings.
i love to cook for my family and friends.
I enjoy spending time with my mom as she is a great listener and always has good advice.
I just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hey there! I'm doing great thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing okay, a little sad because my brother is leaving for the army but otherwise I'm doing well.
Oh no, that's tough. I'm sure he'll be home before you know it though!
Yeah, I hope so. At least he'll be safe and serving his country.
Absolutely! I'm sure he'll make you proud.
Thanks, I hope so too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go for long walks with my wife and our dog, Snowball.
That sounds lovely! I love dogs. What kind of dog is Snowball?
He's a white fluffy Samoyed. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Aww, he sounds adorable! I love Samoyeds.
Yeah, he's the best dog I could ever ask for.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to cook. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new recipes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. I'm pretty good at it, I like to think.
Well, I'm sure your food is delicious!
Thanks, I appreciate that! I'm sure yours is too, if you're willing to share some of your recipes with me!
Sure, I'd be happy to. I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
Perfect! I'll send you my email address, and we can start sharing recipes
